participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and determined, Ethan is driven by success and enjoys sports, particularly skateboarding, despite recent injuries.
participant_1.background: i grew up in manhattan. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. my parents are very wealthy bankers. i plan to go to business school next year.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Energetic and fun-loving, Lily is passionate about sports, especially skateboarding, and loves spending time outdoors.
participant_2.background: my favourite skater is rob dryden. i'm always wearing a hat. i'm a skateboarder. i've a broken arm. my friends are all skateboarders.

content.text: That is great. i want to be an accountant
Yes, it is very safe job. I have broken my arm last week.
I am sorry to hear that.
I was skating and fell down, so pitty!
Not so cool as it might be.
I will have to try it.
All my friends are skateboarders. Do you like to skate?
And doy you have hat? I wear my everywhere and everytime!
I have a few, that is a great idea!
Let`s take our hats and have a walk!
I love the smell of the trees and it is a beautiful day
Yes, sounds great! What is your job?
I work at a bank, and i work at a local place.
